pages.text: Pedestals may be used to decoratively display items, or perform $(thing)summonings$() if arranged particularly.
If one places a $(item)crude soul crystal$() on this pedestal, one may then empty the souls out of their $(item)soul crystal$(), for convenience.
Key for $(thing)summonings$(), detailed on the following pages.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: This structure allows the practitioner to perform $(thing)summonings$() by infusing a soul with particular items to change its nature. Arrange the items on the outer pedestals, and a $(item)soul crystal$() with the required soul on the central one, then touch it with empty hands. However, as I write this, there is no known combination of items and soul that brings about any reaction....
